column1: Smoque BBQ////I've heard all the hype
column2: so when I moved to the neighborhood I went on my first night. I went alone
column3: got carryout and ordered the Brisket sandwich. I can't say I've had brisket before
column4: but it was excellent. They apparently cook it for 15 hours
column6: and the bbq flavor is awesome. The sauces were amazing
column7: the Memphis in particlular was my favorite. Fries are good
